title: MyDaylife
subtitle: Give a score to your life!
firstColumnText: How many times did you feel like flying and touching the sky? How many times did you think about leaving everything behind and starting over? MyDaylife is the first multimedia diary for iPhone that lets you mark your days, generating a graphic representation of your life. It records your thoughts, emotions and images of the day you just experienced so that you can find and explore them any time you want to.
secondColumnText:
MyDaylife was the first project I worked on at Mr. APPs. Early versions of MyDaylife were companions of life of their users; with this new version we wanted to take a big step renewing GUI and structure.
The app was very successful both nationally and internationally, ending up on the front pages of many newspapers.

features.title: Stats
features.subtitle:
- 50.000 downloads
- First place in App Store in 24 countries

title: Blurred Life
subtitle: Mainstream filters for your iPhone. In a tap.
firstColumnText: Create magnificent iOS 7-ready wallpapers with Blurred Life! Impress your friends with a gorgeous wallpaper for your iPhone made by yourself with Blurred Life. With this app you can pick a photo from Camera Roll or take one with your Camera, add effects like "Blur", "Brightness", "Saturation" and "Text" and create wallpapers optimized for iOS parallax effect.
secondColumnText:
Blurred Life is a very dear project to me. Using components and instruments for image adjustments that I had only seen on Photoshop was a challenge for me, but in the end it was a great success and I learn a lot.
Blurred Life was the first app that I tried to porting in Swift at the WWDC 2014.

features.title: Stats
features.subtitle:
- 40.000 downloads
- First place in App Store in 10 countries

title: San Marino News24
subtitle: The great news collector about San Marino
firstColumnText: San Marino News24 is your starting point for the news of the Republic of San Marino. SM News24 aggregates in one app all the news regarding San Marino and the surroundings areas. You can filter them by providers or categories and add them to your favourites, so you can read them offline later.
secondColumnText:
Tired of reading online news sites with unrensponsive layout, I wanted to fix it: that's how SM News24 came to life.
The goal of the app is to inform citizens in realtime on current events and making them part of the discussion.

features.title: Stats
features.subtitle:
- Top 100 in News Category
- "Best New Apps" in Italian App Store
- "Popular near me" in San Marino

features.title: Optimized for
features.subtitle: iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus and iPad Air 2

title: San Marino Differenzia
subtitle: Your assistant for recycling in San Marino.
firstColumnText:
Recycling in San Marino has never been so quick and easy with San Marino Differenzia!
The app is designed to help San Marino citizens in the curbside garbage collection and for separate waste into different recycle bins, so they can increase their ecological footprint and help the environment.
secondColumnText:
The app is having a great success among the citizens who are currently using the curbside garbage collection service.
The app received the support of the National Company for Public Services (AASS) and Cooperativa Trasforma.

features.title: Stats
features.subtitle:
- "Best New Apps" in Italian App Store
- Sponsored by AASS and Trasforma

title: That's Music
subtitle: Your best friend for live music around you.
firstColumnText:
That's Music is a new service totally free for discovering the most interesting live music events in your city right from your iPhone or iPad.
With That's Music you can find live music and emerging bands categorized by genre. You can also bookmark scheduled concerts into your calendar and share them with your friends on social networks.
secondColumnText: Since I love music - especially the world of live music - That's Music is a very promising project in which I had the pleasure of working on, even giving tips and advices of design to my colleagues. The guys of That's Music are our friends who have invested in this area and opened a startup in Umbria (Italy).

features.title: Stats
features.subtitle:
- First place into its category (Italy)
- "Best New Apps" in Italian App Store

features.title: Optimized for
features.subtitle: iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus and iPad Air 2

title: Comparyson
subtitle: Compare and enjoy.
firstColumnText:
Who is the best football player, Messi or Ronaldo? Do you prefer Katy Perry or Rihanna? 
Comparyson is the first comparative social network in the world, with which you can create comparysons and surveys of any kind on any topic. Each comparyson has a time limit that will determine its conclusion; the option which has received most votes will be the winner of the comparyson.
secondColumnText:
Building Comparyson was a big challenge because it was the first Social Network app that I have ever created.
A challenge that proved to be successful, given the recent results of the social network and the app in Italy.
Comparyson is a project entirely conceived and designed in the Republic of San Marino with the precious collaboration of Mr. APPs.

features.title: Stats
features.subtitle:
- First place in Social category (Italy)
- "Best New Apps" in Italian App Store

features.title: Optimized for
features.subtitle: iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus and iPad Air 2

title: More In Italy
subtitle: Renovate your home today. It's easy!
firstColumnText: More In Italy is the app of the consortium of Italian companies that gravitate around the home sector: construction, lighting, appliances, kitchens, furniture, accessories. More In Italy was created in 2013 from an idea of Eusebio Gualino, CEO of Gessi: to unite under one single brand great Italian names and to promote the restructuring of our homes, the center of the life in each of us.
secondColumnText:
The consortium is sponsored by Banca Mediolanum, the financial arm of the Fininvest group, that promoted the app on the Italian TV.
With the app you can find out about the companies in the consortium, news, technical information on the restructuring and events around Italy.

features.title: Stats
features.subtitle: Over 40 big companies joined More In Italy and promoted the app.

title: Tempo di Sconti
subtitle: A whole new shopping experience.
firstColumnText:
Tempo di Sconti is an Italian shopping site focused on discounts and coupons. 
With the official app you can access all the offers sorted by category, and see photos of the products. Once you have added products to your cart, you can order with a quick and simple procedure. The app also includes bundled products and travels.
secondColumnText: Tempo di Sconti is the first app that we designed entirely for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus after their release. It has a very simple flat design yet functional and able to provide all the features of the app to the users. I then added new navigational elements, such as the sidebar or scrolling between bundled products.

features.title: Stats
features.subtitle:
- 50.000 downloads
- First place in "Shopping" category (Italy) for two times

features.title: Optimized for
features.subtitle: iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus and iPad Air 2

title: iNews
subtitle: Stay updated on the go.
firstColumnText:
iNews is a simple and fast app whose goal is to be constantly updated on national and international facts.
The app is divided into several categories: Entertainment, Games&Apps, Chronicles, Technology, Science and Medicine, Gossip. The app sends push notifications when the team publishes the most important news.
secondColumnText: iNews keeps you informed about what's happening in the world in real time! The project is a partnership between Mr. APPs and Daniele Leone, the CEO of Mobinext, a startup company based in Matera (Italy). The application has been designed to have a simple layout but direct and highly customizable thanks to the color and font picker.

features.title: Stats
features.subtitle:
- 1st place on App Store (News category)
- 200.000 daily users

features.title: Optimized for
features.subtitle: iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus and iPad Air 2

title: Reggini Auto
subtitle: The smart soul for your cars.
firstColumnText:
Reggini Auto is the app of the Volkswagen-Audi-Skoda car dealer of the Republic of San Marino.
Reggini Auto allows you to discover opportunities, news and the team of dealership. But mostly it is useful for all motorists thanks to the Diary Deadlines (taxes, car insurance, inspections, etc...), the Service Direct Contact and SOS Call in case of emergency.
secondColumnText:
The GUI of Reggini Auto is custom-designed and is ispired by the unique design of the cars of the Volkswagen Group. The app has been a hit among customers and supporters of Romagna and surroundings.
Reggini is leader in the industry and has been awarded with the Volkswagen Award Italy 2014 for customer care.

title: SEAMan
subtitle: The final software for maintenance on board.
firstColumnText: SEAMan® is a software for the board maintenance, the result of a process of improvement done side by side with ship owners, crew and builders, designed to greatly simplify the complex management of a naval unit. SEAMan includes many features, all accessible by web interface, tablet, smartphone or touch screen placed on board.
secondColumnText: SEAMan is an hub that collects handbooks, maintenance tasks, spare parts requests and documents. It's used by the italian Guardia di Finanza (Financial Police), the Garde Nationale Tunisienne and the Marine Nationale Tunisienne. The scope of the app and the use by Italian police makes the project of great value and very helpful.

features.title: Client
features.subtitle: Engynya S.r.l. for Guardia di Finanza

features.title: Stats
features.subtitle: Used on board of over 20 types of ships in Italy.

title: Marlù Agenti
subtitle: A valuable app for agents.
firstColumnText: Marlù Agenti is the official application for the agents that deal with the Marlù Jewels products. This app contains all the catalogs of Marlù products even in offline mode and it can execute a new order, manage the master data of its customers and consult the history of the orders executed
secondColumnText: Marlù is an app made exclusively for agents, allowing them to save paper, make calculations, check availability in stock and other controls. It's characterized by an elegant and veiled design.

features.title: Stats
features.subtitle: Used by Marlù Agents all around Italy.

title: myITIS
subtitle: My school, in a touch.
firstColumnText: myITIS is the first Italian app to access the electronic registry of the High School. It is designed for students of ITIS "Leonardo da Vinci" of Rimini, my high school. With myITIS you can consult grades, absences, disciplinary notes, communications from the school and access to e-learning. The app allows users to have under control every aspects of their school career.
secondColumnText:
myITIS was a real innovation for the school. It's the first time in Italy that a student publishes a useful application for his classmates.
myITIS is a project I developed for the graduation exam of 2012 with Stefano Belli (Android) under the supervision of professors Maurizio Conti and Riccardo Bianchi.

features.title: Client
features.subtitle:
ITIS "Leonardo da Vinci" Rimini
Academic Project

features.title: Stats
features.subtitle: Used by 500 students in the school (out of 900)

title: FridgeList
subtitle: Write a shopping list. Without writing it.
firstColumnText:
FridgeList is a quick and easy way to write a grocery list without actually having to write anything.
Approaching an NFC tag - representing a food - the "Cart" (built with Arduino) adds the food to the grocery list and it will send it to the webservice which will update the list on all devices.
secondColumnText: FridgeList is an original idea of my friend, Thomas Righi, evolved for submission as project of the course "Embedded System Programming" of prof. Alessandro Ricci. The project is based on Arduino with NFC Breakout Board and WiFi Shield and is based on a sketch written by me and libraries written by the producer.

title: FiDO
subtitle: The easiest way to track the life of your pets.
firstColumnText: FiDO is the best companion of your pets (right after the owner, of course 😉). With FiDO you can track the animals' weight, diet, visits, events and competitions, so you can always check the health of your pet and let the app guide you in the everyday life. It also includes some charts to visually see the progress.
secondColumnText:
FiDO is an academic project made by me and Michele Sapignoli for the course of "Object-Oriented Programming" held by prof. Mirko Viroli at Computer Science & Engineering.
He's complimented us for the high level design, both graphical and structural, of the app.
